header.title: Get the Brazilian typeform with Eternal Access!

intro.subtitle: Stop paying for typeform in dollars! Win new Qualified Leads efficiently at a fair price!

video.not_supported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

challenge.title: Do you have any idea how hard it is to close a sale in the digital world? Imagine needing 100 leads just to close a single sale. This reality can be extremely challenging and discouraging for many.
challenge.solution: Imagine filtering your customers and bringing only those who are really interested in your product? That's exactly what you can do with SpotForm.

features.title: Our Features - The CRM that delivers the most while being the most accessible on the market.
features.feature1: 1- Manage your Leads and create dynamic forms.
features.feature2: 2- Pixel code, Google tracking, Quick redirection to WhatsApp.
features.feature3: 3- Manage your leads and classify your audience with custom tags

unique.title: The ONLY Form-based competitor to Typeform, Blip, RD Station with LOW COST and high quality.
unique.description1: You've certainly seen some platforms that create forms but charge you a high monthly fee and even limit the number of forms and lead responses.
unique.description2: Here you can: Create unlimited forms and receive as many leads as you want.

benefits.negative1: You will not have a cost per form
benefits.negative2: You won't be limited in creating new forms
benefits.positive1: You can use the forms with as many Clients as you want
benefits.positive2: You can manage all your leads in one place
benefits.positive3: You can customize everything the way you want and without limitations

conclusion: This is the EASIEST and most ECONOMIC way to present professionalism to your customers!
